ohu gershonge pelapathata ayath ladangen pawatha aa pradhaninge puthrayeki. 22 yehowa dewige gruhaye thibu wasthu bharawa sitiye+ yehiyelige puthrayan wu shetham saha yowelya.+ 23 amramgen, ishhargen, hebrongen ha ussiyelgen+ pawatha aa aya sewaya kale 24 gabadawa bharawa siti mosesge puthrayeku wu gershomge puth shebuyelge+ nayakathwaya yatatheya. 25 ohuge sahodarayan atharin eliyesar+ sitiyeya.

mulin sandahan kala paridi eyin sulu pramanayak hara, thiru badu rekha 3,719 danatamath thirubadu rahitha eewa wana bawin, mulu thirubadu rekha walin 50% k mema giwisuma balathmaka wana witama lihil karanaya wana athara ehi prathipalayak washayen aadayama ho deshiya karmantha matha kshanikawa balapamak sidu nowanu atha.
ee welawa oba waya kala yuthu wanne eela`ga mohothe athata ena widyawata liyana hati gana hithannatayi.

wishwasaniyathwaya nathi wi thibenawa.
me wana wita uthuru wiyatnamaya da mulu wi wagabim pramanayen 59% demuhum wi wagakarana athara owun lokaye sahal apanayanaya karana ratawal atharin dewana sthanayata pathwa atha.

shri lanka maha bankuwe bhandagara bandumkara nikuth kirima pilibanda pariksha kirime saha wimarshanaya kirime janadhipathi wimarshana komishan sabhawe saha barapathala wancha, dushana, rajya sampath, waraprasada, balaya saha adhikariya anisi lesa bhawitha kirima sambandhayen wimarshanaya kirima sandaha wu janadhipathi parikshana komishan sabhawe wartha 2018 janawari 17 wanida parlimenthuwe mahalekamwarayata bara dena ladi.

ohu ge yahaluwanta da andina.dukata path mangihu sisu pirisata mudal pirinamannata wuha.rupiyal pandahak hoya gannata owunata wadiwelawak giye natha.owuhu pa‡∑ärasiddhiyema mudal siyalla mawata pirinamuha.mawa pin di aadhara mudala baragena siya puthu ha wenwa giye aluth balaporoththuwakin pibidemini.sisuwo yali ‚Äòbuk mark‚Äô alewi karannata patangathha.pasuda sisu daruwange widuhalpathiwaraya idiriye peni sitiye aaganthuka kathaki.

manussayek maranna yana bawa danagena hitiye na.
"mama wyapara kalamanakaranaya pilibanda wishwawidyala mahacharyawarayek.
mangak durata enakota dakka wiktoriya wellata harena para ethana loku bong ekak gahala thibuna.
hora rata panneya.
yudha aparadha parikshana sandaha awasara dime thiranaya parlimenthuwata
ada lankawe mama nirbhitha madhyawediyek lesa dakinne ekama ekkenayi.

uthsawa samaye minis paribhojanayata nusudusu narakwu arthapal, lokulunu ha mas malu athulu kal ikuthwa giya aahara drawya rashiyak mahajanathawata alewi karanu labu dehiwala ‚Äì galkissa maha nagara simawe welenda sal watala elesa alewiyata ha gabada kara thibu rupiyal lakshayakata aasanna watinakamakin yuth aahara kilo desiyayaka thogayak athadanguwata gena ema sthanaye dima sahamulinma winasha kara damimata dehiwala pradhana saukhya waidya niladhari waidya indika ellawala mahatha athulu mahajana saukhya parikshaka niladharihu piyawara gena thibe.mese winasha kala aahara drawya thogaya athara sosejas kilo 42k, krumin wisin hani kala paribhojanayata nusudusu parippu kilo 20k, thunapaha kilo 13k, kabali miris kilo 21k, soya mit gram 200 pakat 10k, welana lada umbalakada gram 400 pakat 03k, kithul hakuru kilo 02k, majarin gram 40 pakat kilo 06k, gi‡∑äran pis gram 500 pakat 10k, parata roti gram 750 pakat 10k, mas samanga ekata gabada kara thibu hayiland batar pakat 30k, paribhojanayata nusudusu palawi thibu arthapal kilo 15 k, saha kaha parippu kilo 22k athulu aahara thogayak thibu bawa mahajana saukhya parikshaka lalith perera mahatha pawasayi.athadanguwata gath mema aahara drawya thogaya athara manushya paribhojanayata ahithakara lebal rahithawa alewi kala aahara da we.mema watalima sidukara aththe nagaraye welendasal rasaka kal ikuth wu paribhojanayata nusudusu aahara drawya itha wishala washayen alewi karanu labana bawata kottasa bhara mahajana saukhya parikshaka jiwan wijesinha mahathata warin wara mahajanathawagen lada thorathuru mathayi.pradhana mahajana saukhya parikshaka lalith perera mahathage upades paridi mahajana saukhya parikshakawarun wana ti. je. je. es. piris, ke. si. aar. kaushalyaya, dabliw.
